title: Ticket #4257: there should be a separate knob for system valid spool files
description:
When the user changes VALID_SPOOL_FILES, they should only be increasing the set of files that are valid. There should be another knob, (or function?) that specifies the valid spool files that are known by HTCondor at compile time. The user would normally not set this other knob, and by default VALID_SPOOL_FILES will be empty.

The new knob will be SYSTEM_VALID_SPOOL_FILES its default value will be what VALID_SPOOL_FILES was set to before this change.
